member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine
member.summary: This is the core engine for creating bytes to send down a socket and to receive bytes from a socket.
Core engine for processing socket communication. Handles the serialization of messages for transmission and the reconstruction of received messages from byte streams.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2
member.summary: Improved C# LZF Compressor, a very small data compression library. The compression algorithm is extremely fast.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.BUFFER_SIZE_ESTIMATE
member.summary: Multiple of input size used to estimate work/output buffer size. Larger values increase initial memory usage but potentially reduces number of allocations.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.HLOG
member.summary: Size of hashtable is 2^HLOG bytes. Decompression is independent of the hash table size. The difference between 15 and 14 is very small for small blocks (and 14 is usually a bit faster). For a low-memory/faster configuration, use HLOG == 13; For best compression, use 15 or 16 (or more, up to 22).

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.HashTable
member.summary: Hashtable, that can be allocated only once.

member.name: F:SocketMeister.Messages.MessageEngine.CLZF2.locker
member.summary: Lock object for access to hashtable so that we can keep things thread safe. Still up to the caller to make sure any shared outputBuffer use is thread safe.

member.name: T:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry
member.summary: Lightweight, thread-safe runtime telemetry view for SocketMeister. Provides a live read-only view and the ability to produce immutable snapshots for consistent multi-field reads.

member.name: M:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new telemetry instance with default update interval and EWMA window. Starts a low-frequency, non-reentrant timer to periodically sample counters and update rolling averages.

member.summary: Number of active connections. Client: 0/1. Server: 0..N.

member.summary: Peak observed concurrent connections since uptime origin.

member.summary: Seconds since process-level start (server start; client first-ever successful connection).

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry.SessionUptimeSeconds
member.summary: Seconds since current active session began (client reconnect resets; server restart resets).

member.summary: Total successful messages (send + receive) since session start.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry.TotalFailures
member.summary: Total failed send attempts since session start.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry.AvgMessageThroughput
member.summary: Rolling average messages per second.

member.summary: Total uncompressed body bytes observed (send + receive) since session start.

member.name: P:SocketMeister.SocketTelemetry.CompressionSavingsBytes

member.summary: Number of protocol/framing errors observed in receive processing since session start.
